name: airtable_list_bases
description: List all bases from the Airtable dashboard. Returns base names, icons, and URLs visible on the home screen.

steps.code: const bases = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="base-card"], .baseContainer, .base-card'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 50); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const nameEl = card.querySelector('[data-testid="base-name"], .baseCardName, .base-name, h3, span'); const name = nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || card.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0, 60) || ''; const link = card.closest('a') || card.querySelector('a'); const url = link?.href || ''; const iconEl = card.querySelector('.baseIcon, [data-testid="base-icon"], svg, img'); const icon = iconEl?.getAttribute('aria-label') || iconEl?.getAttribute('alt') || ''; if (name && name.length > 0) { bases.push({ name: name.substring(0, 100), url: url, icon: icon }); } } return { result_count: bases.length, bases: bases }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract base names, icons, and URLs
